snippet: Kathryn Tappen, who hosts a nightly highlights show on NHL Network, is a former Rutgers track star who is diplomatic about her rooting interests.
abstract: Kathryn Tappen, who hosts a nightly highlights show on NHL Network, is a former Rutgers track star who is diplomatic about her rooting interests.

headline.main: 30 Seconds With Kathryn Tappen: NHL Network Job Is Merely the Latest Highlight
headline.print_headline: 30 Seconds With Kathryn Tappen: NHL Network Job Is Merely the Latest Highlight
